TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi HtmlTextWriter extends System.IO.TextWriter

summary.span: 将标记字符和文本写入 ASP.NET 服务器控件输出流。

span.span: Writes markup characters and text to an ASP.NET server control output stream.

summary.span: 此类提供 ASP.NET 服务器控件在向客户端呈现标记时使用的格式化功能。

span.span: This class provides formatting capabilities that ASP.NET server controls use when rendering markup to clients.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于在桌面浏览器中呈现 HTML 4.0。The class is used to render HTML 4.0 to desktop browsers. 也是命名空间中所有标记编写器 （包括 、 和类）的基类 。The is also the base class for all markup writers in the namespace, including the , , and classes. 这些类用于编写各种类型的标记的元素、特性和样式和布局信息。These classes are used to write the elements, attributes, and style and layout information for different types of markup. 此外，这些类由与每个标记语言关联的页和控件适配器类使用。In addition, these classes are used by the page and control adapter classes that are associated with each markup language. 在大多数情况下，ASP.NET 会自动为请求设备使用适当的编写器。In most circumstances, ASP.NET automatically uses the appropriate writer for the requesting device. 但是，如果您创建自定义文本编写器或要指定特定的编写器来呈现特定设备的页，则必须将该编写器映射到 `controlAdapters` 应用程序 .browser 文件的节中的页。However, if you create a custom text writer or if you want to specify a particular writer to render a page for a specific device, you must map the writer to the page in the `controlAdapters` section of the application .browser file. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 从类派生的自定义控件的方法 。The following code example shows how to override the method of a custom control that is derived from the class. 此代码示例演示如何使用各种 方法、属性和字段。The code example illustrates how to use various methods, properties, and fields. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果特性不是值之一，则使用方法的重载; 如果特性在运行时之前是未知的，则使用。Use the overload of the method if the attribute is not one of the values, or if the attribute is not known until run time. 对于任何给定标记元素的实例，类将 维护该元素的特性列表。For an instance of any given markup element, the class maintains a list of attributes for that element. 调用方法时，方法添加的任何特性都将 呈现到元素的开始标记中。When the method is called, any attributes added by the method are rendered to the opening tag of the element. 然后从对象中清除属性列表 。The list of attributes is then cleared from the object. 呈现标记元素的编码模式如下所示：The coding pattern for rendering markup elements is as follows: - 使用 方法可将任何特性添加到元素。Use the method to add any attributes to the element. - 使用 方法。Use the method. - 根据需要使用其他方法来呈现在元素的开始标记和结束标记之间找到的内容。Use other methods as needed to render the content found between the element's opening and closing tags. - 使用 方法。Use the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 在调用方法之前调用方法 。The following code example demonstrates how to call the method before calling the method. 此代码调用的两个不同重载 和两个不同的重载，然后 调用 方法以将 `` 元素呈现到输出流中。The code calls two different overloads of and two different overloads of before it calls the method to render a `` element to the output stream. 方法用于定义名为的自定义特性 `CustomAttribute` ，以及 `CustomAttributeValue` `` 此代码呈现的元素的名为的自定义值。The method is used to define the custom attribute named `CustomAttribute` and the custom value named `CustomAttributeValue` for the `` element that this code renders. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果特性不是值之一，则使用方法的重载; 如果特性在运行时之前是未知的，则使用方法重载。Use the overload of the method if the attribute is not one of the values, or if the attribute is not known until run time and encoding is needed. 对于任何给定标记元素的实例，类将 维护该元素的特性列表。For an instance of any given markup element, the class maintains a list of attributes for that element. 调用方法时，方法添加的任何特性都将 呈现到元素的开始标记中。When the method is called, any attributes added by the method are rendered to the opening tag of the element. 然后从对象中清除属性列表 。The list of attributes is then cleared from the object. `fEncode` `true` 如果属性可能包含引号 ( ") 、小于号 ( # A0) 或 ( # A1) ，则使用的方法设置为。Use the method with `fEncode` set to `true`, if the attribute can possibly contain a quotation mark ("), a less than sign (<), or an ampersand (&). 方法调用将对特性进行编码，以满足请求设备的要求。The method call will encode the attribute to meet the requirements of the requesting device. `fEncode` `false` 如果你知道不会生成任何这些字符，或者如果你知道该属性已经编码，则可以将设置为。You can set `fEncode` to `false`, if you know that none of these characters will be generated, or if you know that the attribute is already encoded. 如果特性类型为 `Style` ，则即使为，也不会对值进行编码 `fEndode` `true` 。If the attribute type is `Style`, the value won't be encoded even if `fEndode` is `true`. 确保该样式值符合 CSS 且不包含恶意代码。Ensure that the style value is CSS-compliant and doesn't contain malicious code. 呈现标记元素的编码模式如下所示：The coding pattern for rendering markup elements is as follows: - 使用 方法可将任何特性添加到元素。Use the method to add any attributes to the element. - 使用 方法。Use the method. - 根据需要使用其他方法来呈现在元素的开始标记和结束标记之间找到的内容。Use other methods as needed to render the content found between the element's opening and closing tags. - 使用 方法。Use the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法的 重载， 以确保未对元素的自定义特性（名为 `myattribute` 和）进行编码 `` 。The following code example shows how to use the overload of the method to ensure that a custom attribute, named `myattribute`, and its value are not encoded for an `` element.
